Name: Long Journey
About the game: Long journey - Many people know that a large amount of sweets is bad for teeth .. But not for this skeleton! Embark on a long adventure with this skinny sweet tooth and collect all the donuts! This hardcore platformer will test your strength - dangerous enemies, treacherous traps and abysses await you at every turn. Use all your skills to collect as many sweets as possible while dodging the evil samurai and get to the end of the game! Can you... Features: Nice graphics by GeorFi ,Nice soundtrack by GeorFi.
